mutants.original_line: shifted_arr = [val - max_val for val in arr]
mutants.mutated_line: exp_arr = [2 ** val for val in shifted_arr]
mutants.code:
def softmax(arr):
    max_val = max(arr)
    shifted_arr = [val + max_val for val in arr]
    exp_arr = [2 ** val for val in shifted_arr]
    sum_exp = sum(exp_arr)
    softmax_arr = [val / sum_exp for val in exp_arr]
    return softmax_arr
